properties.name: spring.datasource.database
properties.description: The name of the database used by the Spring application.

properties.name: spring.datasource.host
properties.description: The host address where the Spring application's database is located.

properties.name: spring.datasource.port
properties.description: The port number on which the database server of the Spring application is running.

properties.name: app.security.jwt.keystore-path
properties.description: The file path to the keystore used for JWT (JSON Web Token) security purposes.

properties.name: app.security.jwt.keystore-password
properties.description: The password required to access the keystore for JWT authentication.

properties.name: app.security.jwt.key-alias
properties.description: The alias representing a specific key within the keystore used for JWT authentication.

properties.name: app.security.jwt.private-key-passphrase
properties.description: The passphrase for the private key used in JWT token generation and validation.
